metadata.title: UAC - All Admin Approval Mode (Windows 8)
metadata.description: User Account Control must run all administrators in Admin Approval Mode, enabling UAC. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Printing Over HTTP (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Printing over HTTP must be prevented. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Security State Change - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit System - Security State Change successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Maximum Log Size - System (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The System event log must be configured to a minimum size requirement. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Everyone Anonymous Rights (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must not be configured to give anonymous users Everyone rights. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit Policy Subcategory Setting (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Audit policy using subcategories must be enabled. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Force Logoff When Logon Hours Expire (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to force users to log off when their allowed logon hours expire. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Enable computer and user accounts to be trusted for delegation (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Enable computer and user accounts to be trusted for delegation user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: FIPS Compliant Algorithms (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to use FIPS-compliant algorithms for encryption, hashing, and signing. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: WINCC-000128 (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Windows Remote Management (WinRM) service must not store RunAs credentials. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Set Encryption Level (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Remote Desktop Services must be configured with the client connection encryption set to the required level. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - IPSec Driver - Failure (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit System - IPsec Driver failures. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: SMB Server Packet Signing (Always) (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Windows SMB server must be configured to always perform SMB packet signing. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Audit Policy Change - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Policy Change - Audit Policy Change successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Always Install with Elevated Privileges Disabled (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Windows Installer Always install with elevated privileges must be disabled. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Generate security audits (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Generate security audits user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Maximum Log Size - Application (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Application event log must be configured to a minimum size requirement. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - User Account Management - Failure (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Account Management - User Account Management failures. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Maximum Machine Account Password Age (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The maximum age for machine account passwords must be set to requirements. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Debug Programs (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Debug programs user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Increase scheduling priority (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Increase scheduling priority user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UAC - Admin Elevation Prompt (Windows 8)
metadata.description: User Account Control must, at minimum, prompt administrators for consent on the secure desktop. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Disable IP Source Routing (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to prevent IP source routing. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UAC - Non UAC Compliant Application Virtualization (Windows 8)
metadata.description: User Account Control must virtualize file and registry write failures to per-user locations. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Manage auditing and security log (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Manage auditing and security log user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Signing of Secure Channel Traffic (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Outgoing secure channel traffic must be signed when possible. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Maximum Log Size - Security (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Security event log must be configured to a minimum size requirement. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Logon - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Logon/Logoff - Logon successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Logoff - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Logon/Logoff - Logoff successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Security System Extension - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit System - Security System Extension successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Bad Logon Attempts (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The number of allowed bad logon attempts must meet minimum requirements. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Forcibly Disconnect when Logon Hours Expire (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Users must be forcibly disconnected when their logon hours expire. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Maximum Password Age (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Maximum password age must meet minimum requirements. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: WINCC-000125 (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Windows Remote Management (WinRM) client must not use Digest authentication. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Security Group Management - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Account Management - Security Group Management successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: SMB Client Packet Signing (Always) (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Windows SMB client must be configured to always perform SMB packet signing. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Modify firmware environment values (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Modify firmware environment values user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Computer Account Password Reset (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The computer account password must not be prevented from being reset. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: WINCC-000126 (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Windows Remote Management (WinRM) service must not use Basic authentication. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: WINCC-000123 (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Windows Remote Management (WinRM) client must not use Basic authentication. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Create permanent shared objects (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Create permanent shared objects user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Built-in Admin Account Status (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The built-in administrator account must be disabled. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Create a pagefile (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Create a pagefile user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Authentication Policy Change - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Policy Change - Authentication Policy Change successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Special Logon - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Logon/Logoff - Special Logon successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: LanMan Authentication Level (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The LanMan authentication level must be set to send NTLMv2 response only, and to refuse LM and NTLM. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Enumerate Administrator Accounts on Elevation (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must require username and password to elevate a running application. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Internet Download / Online Ordering (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Web publishing and online ordering wizards must be prevented from downloading a list of providers. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Credential Validation - Failure (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Account Logon - Credential Validation failures. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Sharing and Security Model for Local Accounts (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to use the Classic security model. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Search - Encrypted Files Indexing (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Indexing of encrypted files must be turned off. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Autoplay for non-volume devices (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Autoplay must be turned off for non-volume devices. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Name-Release Attacks (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to ignore NetBIOS name release requests except from WINS servers. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Modify an object label (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Modify an object label user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Case Insensitivity for Non-Windows (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to require case insensitivity for non-Windows subsystems. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Minimum Password Age (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The minimum password age must meet requirements. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Sensitive Privilege Use - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Privilege Use - Sensitive Privilege Use successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Session Security for NTLM SSP Based Servers (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to meet the minimum session security requirement for NTLM SSP based servers. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Computer Identity Authentication for NTLM (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Services using Local System that use negotiate when reverting to NTLM authentication must use the computer identity vs. authenticating anonymously. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: WN08-CC-000053 (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Signing in using a PIN must be turned off. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Windows Installer - User Control (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Users must be prevented from changing installation options. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: NTLM NULL Session Fallback (Windows 8)
metadata.description: NTLM must be prevented from falling back to a Null session. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: WN08-CC-000015 (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Connections to non-domain networks when connected to a domain authenticated network must be blocked. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Take ownership of files or other objects (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Take ownership of files or other objects user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UAC - UIAccess Application Elevation (Windows 8)
metadata.description: User Account Control must only elevate UIAccess applications that are installed in secure locations. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Sensitive Privilege Use - Failure (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Privilege Use - Sensitive Privilege Use failures. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: SMB Server Packet Signing (if client agrees) (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Windows SMB server must perform SMB packet signing when possible. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - System Integrity - Failure (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit System - System Integrity failures. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: SPN Target Name Validation Level (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The service principal name (SPN) target name validation level must be configured to Accept if provided by client. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: RSS Attachment Downloads (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Attachments must be prevented from being downloaded from RSS feeds. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Allow log on locally (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Allow log on locally user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Access this computer from the network
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Access this computer from the network user right.

criterion.comment: Access this computer from the network - Administrators

metadata.title: Password Uniqueness (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Password uniqueness must meet minimum requirements. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: RPC - Unauthenticated RPC Clients (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthenticated RPC clients must be restricted from connecting to the RPC server. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Direct Access - Route Through Internal Network (Windows 8)
metadata.description: All Direct Access traffic must be routed through the internal network. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Credential Validation - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Account Logon - Credential Validation successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Legal Banner Dialog Box Title (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Windows dialog box title for the legal banner must be configured. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Default Autorun Behavior (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The default autorun behavior must be configured to prevent autorun commands. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Storage of Passwords and Credentials (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to prevent the storage of passwords and credentials. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Reversible Password Encryption (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Reversible password encryption must be disabled. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Microsoft Strong Password Filtering (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The built-in Microsoft password complexity filter must be enabled. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Logon - Failure (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Logon/Logoff - Logon failures. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Lockout Duration (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Lockout duration must meet minimum requirements. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Drive Redirection (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Local drives must be prevented from sharing with Remote Desktop Session Hosts. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Create a token object (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Create a token object user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - IPSec Driver - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit System - IPsec Driver successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Disable Media Autoplay (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Autoplay must be disabled for all drives. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Prevent Password Saving (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Passwords must not be saved in the Remote Desktop Client. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: WINCC-000124 (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Windows Remote Management (WinRM) client must not allow unencrypted traffic. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Password Prompting (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Remote Desktop Services must always prompt a client for passwords upon connection. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - System Integrity - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit System - System Integrity successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Create symbolic links (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Create symbolic links user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Back up files and directories (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Back up files and directories user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Windows Explorer - Heap Termination (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Turning off File Explorer heap termination on corruption must be disabled. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: PKU2U Online Identities Authentication (Windows 8)
metadata.description: PKU2U authentication using online identities must be prevented. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Process Creation - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Detailed Tracking - Process Creation successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: WINCC-000127 (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Windows Remote Management (WinRM) service must not allow unencrypted traffic. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Anonymous Access to Named Pipes and Shares (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares must be restricted. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Domain Controller authentication for unlock (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Domain Controller authentication must not be required to unlock the workstation. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Kerberos Encryption Types (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Kerberos encryption types must be configured to prevent the use of DES and RC4 encryption suites. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Other Account Management Events - Failure (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Account Management - Other Account Management Events failures. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Replace a process level token (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Replace a process level token user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Bad Logon Counter Reset (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Windows 8 must be configured for the period of time before the bad logon counter is reset to 15 minutes or greater.

metadata.title: Minimum Password Length (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Passwords must, at a minimum, be 14 characters. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Idle Time Before Suspending a Session. (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The amount of idle time required before suspending a session must be properly set. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Encrypting and Signing of Secure Channel Traffic (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Outgoing secure channel traffic must be encrypted or signed. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: LAN Manager Hash Value Stored (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to prevent the storage of the LAN Manager hash of passwords. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UAC - Admin Approval Mode (Windows 8)
metadata.description: User Account Control approval mode for the built-in Administrator must be enabled. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Application Compatibility Program Inventory (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Application Compatibility Program Inventory must be prevented from collecting data and sending the information to Microsoft. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: IPv6 Source Routing (Windows 8)
metadata.description: IPv6 source routing must be configured to the highest protection level. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Disable ICMP Redirect (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to prevent ICMP redirects from overriding OSPF generated routes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Force shutdown from a remote system (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Force shutdown from a remote system user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Power Mgmt - Password Wake When Plugged In (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The user must be prompted for a password on resume from sleep (plugged in). (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Limit Blank Passwords (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Local accounts with blank passwords must be restricted to prevent access from the network. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Profile single process (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Profile single process user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Other Account Management - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Account Management - Other Account Management Events successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Create global objects (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Create global objects user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Restrict Anonymous Network Shares (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Anonymous enumeration of shares must be restricted. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Impersonate a client after authentication (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Impersonate a client after authentication user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Legal Notice Display (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The required legal notice must be configured to display before console logon. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Power Mgmt - Password Wake on Battery (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Users must be prompted for a password on resume from sleep (on battery). (Windows 8)

metadata.title: TS/RDS - Secure RPC Connection (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Remote Desktop Session Host must require secure RPC communications. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Act as part of the operating system (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Act as part of the operating system user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: SMB Client Packet Signing (if server agrees) (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Windows SMB client must be enabled to perform SMB packet signing when possible. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Change the system time (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Change the system time user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Encryption of Secure Channel Traffic (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Outgoing secure channel traffic must be encrypted when possible. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Perform volume maintenance tasks (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Perform volume maintenance tasks user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Unencrypted Password is Sent to SMB Server (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unencrypted passwords must not be sent to a third-party SMB Server. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Audit Policy Change - Failure (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Policy Change - Audit Policy Change failures. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UAC - Application Installations (Windows 8)
metadata.description: User Account Control must be configured to detect application installations and prompt for elevation. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Restore files and directories (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Restore files and directories user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Smart Card Removal Option (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Smart Card removal option must be configured to Force Logoff or Lock Workstation. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Load and unload device drivers (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Load and unload device drivers user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Restrict Anonymous SAM Enumeration (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Anonymous enumeration of SAM accounts must not be allowed. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: HTTP Printer Drivers (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Downloading print driver packages over HTTP must be prevented. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - User Account Management - Success (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Account Management - User Account Management successes. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Global System Objects Permission Strength (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The default permissions of global system objects must be increased. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: LDAP Client Signing (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Network Security: LDAP client signing requirements (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Lock pages in memory (Windows 8)
metadata.description: Unauthorized accounts must not have the Lock pages in memory user right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Security Group Management - Failure (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit Account Management - Security Group Management failures. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Audit - Security System Extension - Failure (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to audit System - Security System Extension failures. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Session Security for NTLM SSP Based Clients (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to meet the minimum session security requirement for NTLM SSP based clients. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: Strong Session Key (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The system must be configured to require a strong session key. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on locally (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Deny log on locally user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts and local administrator accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Deny access to this computer from the network (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Deny access to this computer from the network user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts and local administrator accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on as a service (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Deny log on as a service user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts on domain systems. No other groups or accounts must be assigned this right. (Windows 8)

metadata.title: UR: Deny log on as a batch job (Windows 8)
metadata.description: The Deny log on as a batch job user right on workstations must be configured to prevent access from highly privileged domain accounts on domain systems and unauthenticated access on all systems. (Windows 8)

notes.note: This check for the Deny log on as a batch will return an Unknown with Policy Auditor 5.3 due a case sensitivity issue with user right name as defined in the schema - sedenybatchLogonright.

metadata.title: Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Everyone
metadata.description: Deny everyone log on through Remote Desktop Services

criterion.comment: Deny log on through Remote Desktop Services - Everyone

metadata.title: WIN00-0000145
metadata.description: Data Execution Prevention (DEP) must be configured to at least Opt Out.

extend_definition.comment: Verifies EMET 5.5 or higher is installed
Verifies 'System DEP' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Application Opt Out' or 'Always On' selected
Verify DEP is set to 'OptOut' or 'AlwaysOn' using BCDEdit method

metadata.title: WIN00-000150
metadata.description: Structured Exception Handling Overwrite Protection (SEHOP) must be turned on.

extend_definition.comment: Verifies SEHOP is on and configured correctly
Verifies EMET 5.5 or higher is installed
Verifies 'System SEHOP' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Application Opt Out' selected

metadata.title: WINGE-000100
metadata.description: The Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit (EMET) v5.5 or later must be installed on the system.

extend_definition.comment: Verifies EMET v5.5 or newer is installed
Verifies EMET is not installed, but DEP and SEHOP are properly configured per V-68843 and V-68847

metadata.title: WINCC-000078
metadata.description: The Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit (EMET) system-wide Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) must be enabled and configured to Application Opt In.

extend_definition.comment: Verifies EMET is not installed, but DEP and SEHOP are properly configured per V-68843 and V-68847
Verifies 'System ASLR' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Application Opt In' selected
Verifies EMET v5.5 or newer is installed

metadata.title: WN08-CC-000082
metadata.description: The Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit (EMET) system-wide Data Execution Prevention (DEP) must be enabled and configured to at least Application Opt Out.

extend_definition.comment: Verifies EMET 5.5 or higher is installed
Verifies 'System DEP' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Application Opt Out' or 'Always On' selected
Verifies EMET is not installed, but DEP and SEHOP are properly configured per V-68843 and V-68847

metadata.title: WN08-CC-000083
metadata.description: The Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit (EMET) system-wide Structured Exception Handler Overwrite Protection (SEHOP) must be configured to Application Opt Out.

extend_definition.comment: Verifies EMET 5.5 or higher is installed
Verifies 'System SEHOP' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Application Opt Out' selected
Verifies EMET is not installed, but DEP and SEHOP are properly configured per V-68843 and V-68847

metadata.title: WN08-CC-000139
metadata.description: Command line data must be included in process creation events.

extend_definition.comment: Verifies 'Include command line in process creation events' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: The HBSS McAfee Agent must be installed.
metadata.description: The HBSS McAfee Agent must be installed.

criterion.comment: McAfee Framework Service is running
McAfee Agent Service is running

metadata.title: The 'SMB 1.0/CIFS File Sharing Support' feature must not be installed.
metadata.description: The SMB 1.0/CIFS File Sharing Support feature must not be installed on Windows 8.1 and Windows Server 2012 R2.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'SMB 1.0/CIFS File Sharing Support' feature is not installed

metadata.title: The Server Message Block (SMB) v1 protocol must be disabled on the SMB server.
metadata.description: The Server Message Block (SMB) v1 protocol must be disabled on the SMB server.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Configure SMBv1 Server' is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: WN08-00-000160
metadata.description: The Server Message Block (SMB) v1 protocol must be disabled on the system.

criteria.comment: Determine if SMB 1.0/CIFS File Sharing Support feature is installed on Windows 8.1

extend_definition.comment: Verifies 'SMB 1.0/CIFS File Sharing Support' feature is not installed

criteria.comment: Determine if SMBv1 Server and SMBv1 client driver are disabled on Windows 8.1

extend_definition.comment: Verifies 'Configure SMBv1 Server' is set to 'Disabled'

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Configure SMBv1 client driver' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Disable driver (recommended)' selected for 'Configure MrxSmb10 driver'

metadata.title: Active Setup\Installed Components Registry Permissions
metadata.description: Standard user accounts must only have Read permissions to the Active Setup Installed Components registry key.

criterion.comment: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Active Setup\Installed Components exists
32-bit Installed Components key has no bad rights for non-(users, adminstrator, system, creator owner, all application packages)
32-bit Installed Components key has no non-(users, adminstrator, system, creator owner, all application packages) rights to check
32-bit Installed Components key has no bad rights for non-(Adminstrators, SYSTEM, CREATOR OWNERS)
32-bit Installed Components key has no non-(Adminstrators, SYSTEM, CREATOR OWNERS) rights to check
Is this a 64-Bit Operating System.
Is this a 64-Bit Operating System.
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Active Setup\Installed Components exists
64-bit Installed Components key has no bad rights for non-(users, adminstrator, system, creator owner, all application packages)
64-bit Installed Components key has no non-(users, adminstrator, system, creator owner, all application packages) rights to check
64-bit Installed Components key has no bad rights for non-(Adminstrators, SYSTEM, CREATOR OWNERS)
64-bit Installed Components key has no non-(Adminstrators, SYSTEM, CREATOR OWNERS) rights to check

metadata.title: Winlogon Registry Permissions
metadata.description: Standard user accounts must only have Read permissions to the Winlogon registry key.

criterion.comment: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon key exists
Winlogon key has no non-(Users group, Administrators group, SYSTEM, TrustedInstaller, ALL APPLICATION PACKAGES) rights to check
Winlogon key has no bad rights for non-(Users group, Administrators group, SYSTEM, TrustedInstaller, ALL APPLICATION PACKAGES)
Winlogon key has no non-(Administrators group, SYSTEM, TrustedInstaller) rights to check
Winlogon key has no bad rights for non-(Administrators group, SYSTEM, TrustedInstaller)

metadata.title: WN08-00-000170
metadata.description: The Server Message Block (SMB) v1 protocol must be disabled on the SMB server.

criteria.comment: Determine if SMBv1 Server is disabled or the SMB 1.0/CIFS File Sharing Support feature is not installed

extend_definition.comment: Verifies 'Configure SMBv1 Server' is set to 'Disabled'
Verifies 'SMB 1.0/CIFS File Sharing Support' feature is not installed

metadata.title: WN08-00-000180
metadata.description: The Server Message Block (SMB) v1 protocol must be disabled on the Windows 8.1 SMB Client.

criteria.comment: Determine if the SMBv1 Client driver is disabled or the SMB 1.0/CIFS File Sharing Support feature is not installed

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Configure SMBv1 client driver' is set to 'Enabled' with 'Disable driver (recommended)' selected for 'Configure MrxSmb10 driver'

extend_definition.comment: Verifies 'SMB 1.0/CIFS File Sharing Support' feature is not installed

metadata.title: Command line data must be included in process creation events
metadata.description: Command line data must be included in process creation events.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Include command line in process creation events' is set to 'Enabled'

metadata.title: Local volumes must be formatted using NTFS.
metadata.description: Local volumes must be formatted using NTFS.

criterion.comment: Local volumes use NTFS

metadata.title: Internet Information System (IIS) or its subcomponents must not be installed on a workstation.
metadata.description: Internet Information System (IIS) or its subcomponents must not be installed on a workstation.

criterion.comment: Verifies 'Internet Information Services' feature is not installed
Verifies 'Internet Information Services Hostable Web Core' feature is not installed

metadata.title: Data Execution Prevention (DEP) must be configured to at least OptOut.
metadata.description: Data Execution Prevention (DEP) must be configured to at least OptOut.

criterion.comment: Verifies DEP is set to 'OptOut'
Verifies DEP is set to 'AlwaysOn'

metadata.title: Structured Exception Handling Overwrite Protection (SEHOP) must be turned on in the registry.
metadata.description: Structured Exception Handling Overwrite Protection (SEHOP) must be turned on in the registry.

criterion.comment: Verifies SEHOP is on and configured correctly

metadata.title: EMET is not installed but DEP and SEHOP are enabled and configured correctly.
metadata.description: EMET is not installed but DEP and SEHOP are enabled and configured correctly.

extend_definition.comment: Verifies DEP is enabled and set to 'OptOut' or 'AlwaysOn'
Verifies SEHOP is on and configured correctly

criterion.comment: Verifies EMET is installed
